about_the_game:
Experience the charm and vibrancy of a leisurely day outdoors with "House of Jigsaw: A Day at the Park" DLC! Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of nature as you race against time to piece a delightful assortment of park-themed jigsaw puzzles. This DLC introduces a relaxing twist to the House of Jigsaw universe, inviting you to showcase your puzzle-solving skills in the midst of a picturesque park setting.

From sun-dappled glades to charming urban oases, immerse yourself in the world of outdoor leisure and let your skills shine! Can you solve the flower jigsaws in the shortest amount of time? Show your results on the community page.



  • Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of nature
  • Multiple puzzle selection
  • Cutouts up to 1000 pieces
  • Different edge cutouts
  • Change background color
  • Incredible zoom
  • Compare your time score with players on the community page
